name: Her Miracle
description:
When Izzy Halliday was a little girl, she saw a strange white-haired girl in her living room when she went to peek at Santa. Now, twenty years later, that girl is back, asking for Izzy's help in creating a Christmas Miracle so she can become a Santa.

Will Izzy fall in love with this odd woman? Or will she find love with the cute cafe worker she's known for several years?

Two choices, three endings.
